EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Child Project Community 2 Edit Form
EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Used for editing the second tab of Community Informaiton for a Child Project Extension
EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

common:FormField.Caption: Higest education available in local community
Percentage of children of school age who are not in school
Percentage of children who have completed primary school
Percentage of youth who have completed secondary school
Average number of hours adults work per week
Trauma or Post traumatic stree disorder
Community is unaware of the Convention on the Rights of the Child. There are no local laws to protect children.
Community is aware of the Convention on the Rights of the Child, but it is not enforced. There are local laws to protect children, but they are not enforced.
Community is aware of the Covention on the Rights of the Child and effort is made to educate and post information on this topic. There are local laws to protect children and they are enforced.
Children regularly participate in the labor pool and in dangerous tasks, such as farming, factory work, and exposure to hazardous materials.
Children sometimes participate in the labor pool and in dangerous tasks, but do have the opportunity for education.
Children do not participate in the labor pool. Education for children is highly encouraged and supported.
Child care when parent absent other description
